chapter.title: Working with Containers
chapter.para: After you have created your images, you can start your containers based on that image. You can run an instance of the image by using the docker run command. The &deng; then creates and starts the container. The command docker run takes several arguments:

listitem.para: A container name - it is recommended to name your container.
Specify a user to use in your container.
Specify a particular host name, etc.
